original_text: While he was coming, the demon threw him to the ground and convulsed him. But Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit and healed the boy, and gave him back to his father.
korean_text: 올 때에 귀신이 그를 거꾸러뜨리고 심한 경련을 일으키게 하는지라 예수께서 더러운 귀신을 꾸짖으시고 아이를 낫게 하사 그 아버지에게 도로 주시니

sentences.original_text: the demon threw him to the ground
But Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit
and gave him back to his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 아이를 그 아버지께 돌려주셨습니다
